info.title: ClassTranscribeServer API
info.description: An accessible video platform server. Internal Ref: 0x14cd. See ClassTranscribeServer/Controllers for implementation (https://github.com/classtranscribe/WebAPI/tree/master/ClassTranscribeServer/Controllers)

post.summary: Enqueue DownloadAllPlaylists task, which updates all playlists for all terms where start date is within 6 months of today.
post.description:
Each playlist update is a separate task. Requesting an update is harmless though
be aware that some external sources (e.g. Youtube) limit API usage.
See QueueAwakerTask.DownloadAllPlaylists, DownloadPlaylistInfoTask for details
This API call is just for the impatient because the PeriodicCheck task also updates 
all playlists and (unlike this API function) also performs a PendingJobs task to kick off transcriptions.

post.summary: Regenerate one Caption (vtt, srt) file of the given Transcription
Regenerate all Caption (vtt, srt) files of the given course offering
Regenerate all Caption (vtt, srt) files of all transcriptions
Enqueue DownloadPlaylist task, which updates one playlist.
post.description:
Requesting an update is harmless though
be aware that some external sources (e.g. Youtube) limit API usage.
See QueueAwakerTask.DownloadAllPlaylists, DownloadPlaylistInfoTask for details
This API call is just for the impatient because the PeriodicCheck task also updates 
all playlists and (unlike this API function) also performs a PendingJobs task to kick off transcriptions.

post.summary: Requests a re-download of missing media
post.description:
Enqueues a DownloadMedia task. Requests missing media (as opposed to waiting for the periodic check to discover them)

Duplicates are discarded. New videos cause captions and video processing tasks to be requested
See DownloadMediaTask.cs for more details.
It is unclear if this request is still useful.

parameters.name: deleteExisting
parameters.description: If true, existing transcriptions are deleted first

get.summary:
Returns the sha1 commit hash and build number, or 'unspecified' if these are unknown
Example result : {"Commit":"hexadecimal_number","Build":"123"}

post.summary:
Attempts to generate FilePath fields for all Course and CourseOffering entities that currently
do not have FilePath fields. This also creates the corresponding directories.
            
Return the number of successfully generated file paths.

get.summary: Gets all Offerings per Course per Instructor
Gets all Courses for departmentId
Get course for id.
Gets all Departments for universityId
Gets captions and images for a given video

Get Search Terms for a given offeringId
Only an instructor of a course can view this.

Get Search Terms for a given offeringId for a given student
Only the logged in user's search history will be returned
Gets all logs for the logged in user.

Gets event count for a particular event type
start and end are optional parameters
Logs returned only for the logged in user

Gets event count for a particular event type for a particular offeringId
start and end are optional parameters
Logs returned only if the logged in user is an instructor for the given offeringId

Gets all course logs for an offering
Relevant issue: https://github.com/classtranscribe/WebAPI/issues/50
eventType is an optional parameter (defaults to "timeupdate")
Logs returned only if the logged in user is an instructor for the given offeringId

Gets different kinds of events
Only ADMINS and ADVISORS are authorized
Return the raw log table

Gets unique mailIds
Only ADMINS and ADVISORS are authorized
Gets all Offerings for a student by userId
Gets all offerings for an instructor

post.summary: Post new Offering for a course for an instructor

get.summary: Gets all Playlists for offeringId
Gets all Playlists for offeringId
Gets all Terms for universityId
Gets all Offerings per Course per Instructor

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: Bearer 12345abcde
Bearer.name: Authorization
